description: A Node.js library for creating algorithmic music

scripts.build: eslint src/**/*.ts && tsc -d && cp -R src/visualizations/templates built/src/visualizations
scripts.test: eslint src/**/*.ts && tsc -d && cp -R src/visualizations/templates built/src/visualizations && jest

author: sevriarch@gmail.com
name: @sevriarch/palestrina
